Title: No software is too simple to have a bug. My kettle has a race condition where after it finishes boil...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: No software is too simple to have a bug. My kettle has a race condition where after it finishes boiling and is in "keep warm" mode if I click the off button and remove it from the base before the ding finishes playing it is still in "keep warm" mode when returned to the base
